thread.title: An hour away from Stockholm, big history in small city
thread.title_full: An hour away from Stockholm, big history in small city - San Francisco Chronicle

author: By Rick Steves
title: An hour away from Stockholm, big history in small city
text:
Photo: Rick Steves 8336599|article-6402583|7 8336599|article-6402583|1 email_share_embed|photo-8336599|article-6402583|1 8336599|article-6402583|2 8336599|article-6402583|3 8336599|article-6402583|4 8336599|article-6402583|5 google_share_embed|photo-8336599|article-6402583|6 Burial mounds just outside the town of Uppsala mark the site where the kingdom of Sweden came together. Burial mounds just outside the town of Uppsala mark the site where...
Uppsala, Sweden’s fourth-largest city, is the best side trip from Stockholm — just under an hour away by train. This happy town is Sweden’s answer to Oxford, offering stately university facilities and museums, the home and garden of botanist Carl Linnaeus, as well as a grand cathedral and the enigmatic burial mounds of Gamla Uppsala on the town’s outskirts. Burial mounds just outside the town of Uppsala mark the site where the kingdom of Sweden came together. Burial mounds just outside the town of Uppsala mark the site where...
Uppsala, Sweden’s fourth-largest city, is the best side trip from Stockholm — just under an hour away by train. This happy town is Sweden’s answer to Oxford, offering stately university facilities and museums, the home and garden of botanist Carl Linnaeus, as well as a grand cathedral and the enigmatic burial mounds of Gamla Uppsala on the town’s outskirts.
